org.sakaiproject.sms.hibernate.logic
Interface SmsAccountLogic

All Known Implementing Classes:
SmsAccountLogicImpl
public interface SmsAccountLogic

The data service will handle all sms Account database transactions for the sms tool in Sakai.

Version:
1.0
Author:
julian@psybergate.com

getSmsAccount

SmsAccount getSmsAccount(java.lang.String sakaiSiteId,
                         java.lang.String SakaiUserId)
Gets a SmsAccount entity for the given sakai site id or sakai user id.

If the property account.checkSiteIdBeforeUserId == true in sms.properties then the method will first attempt to find the sms account by sakai site id. If the returned account is null then it will attempt to finf it by the sakai user id. If no account is found null will be returned.

If the property account.checkSiteIdBeforeUserId == false then it will behave as described above but will first try find the account by sakai user id before the sakai site id.

Parameters:
sakaiSiteId - the sakai site id. Can be null.
SakaiUserId - the sakai user id. Can be null.
Returns:
sms congiguration

getAllSmsAccounts

java.util.List<SmsAccount> getAllSmsAccounts()
Gets all the sms account records

Returns:
List of SmsAccount objects

persistSmsAccount

void persistSmsAccount(SmsAccount smsAccount)
This method will persists the given object. If the object is a new entity then it will be created on the DB. If it is an existing entity then the record will be updated.

Parameters:
sms - account to be persisted

recalculateAccountBalance

                               SmsAccount account)

Parameters:
accountId - the account id
account - the account
